title: Banned for Banter
body:
I write this short post for a reason.
I started playing League in 2009 with a good friend of mine whose now past away in brain-cancer, yet we shared many great moments in the game as he introduced it to me. I still remember running around top-lane as Singed trying to make sense of everything. 
Recently, I tried to log in to play with my girlfriend and all I got was a message saying I'd been banned. Permanently. For "toxicitiy".
I looked at the logs linked and thought... sure, calling people something like "asswipe" and so forth is rather toxic, but it was also both ways - difference being I didn't report them after the match (we won) but they did. How is it that just pressing a button can take away something someone put 10 years of love into because a few trigger-words appear in the chat. I was always the guy greeting everyone at the start of the game, and saying GG when we lost - but none of that matters... if you type the wrong thing, at the wrong time. 
I wish I could play one more game, but truth is I don't think I will be allowed to. For that, I wish everyone here in the community the best of luck in the rift - and that you get some wins for me, much love, Regn.

replies.body:
'I was always the person greeting my victim before I harassed it and would always tell him good banter, after I left him emotionally devastated at the ground' :)

EDIT: 
After reading the logs, great banter.
Are you out of your mind calling *this* bloody banter? Even the stuff you posted and didn't cut out is way, way below standards, you have crossed the line to such an extent I am so happy that you got finally banned, after going on for god knows how long with such behaviour.
What type of games do you play, friendo? It is banter. I originally come from CSGO where much much much worse "banter" would go happen every match -in- -voice- To me this is kindergarden stuff.

And there's a reason CSGO has a low and still dwindling playerbase.

The only thing keeping that game alive is kids screaming at each other in voice chat.

Look, you want family-friendly games, and that's fine. In fact, I dont even f-ing care anymore, Riot can take the game elsewhere if they so darn wish too. But the world is morse diverse than "cursewords" and so forth. LoL used to be much more, but clearly since 10-year+ accounts are getting banned, it's moving into a new era. It's an abyss and will decline if not for china. I will be written off and dumped in a trashcan, which is fine... but bear this wisdom with you, friend.

You can fucking swear in-game as much as you want. The issue is how people treat **other people**.

"Jesust Christ I can't fucking believe I did that, fuck me." isn't going to get you punished.

"Sion you half-r%%%%%ed fucking monkey stop inting. FF 15" will get you punished.

> LoL used to be much more, but clearly since 10-year+ accounts are getting banned, it's moving into a new era. 

But you have to get that you got banned for being severely toxic, do you? Not because you own an old account.
Yeah! I mean, it's supposed to be a match. We taunt one another,  it's no more than that

> Yeah! I mean, it's supposed to be a match. We taunt one another, it's no more than that

No, you *insult*. And people, who have been raised properly should be able to tell the difference.

> What type of games do you play, friendo? 

 I am not your friend, god bless I ain't and which games I prefer doesn't matter.

> It is banter.

No, banter is okay, insulting is not tolerated by Riot and will get you punished, like you were.

>  I originally come from CSGO where much much much worse "banter" would go happen every match -in- -voice- To me this is kindergarden stuff.

I don't give a shit, which games you play and what you are used to. 
If article 522 made rape in marriage  legal in lebanon, it doesn't mean it is in germany. 
Either you play by the rules of Riot, or you get shown the door and thank god you were.
I understand and respect where you come from. I'm sorry my post is so controversial.... all I wanted to say is that i love everyone and despite what I said being toxic. I am not. I love you.
Quod erat demonstrandum, you had your chances and the notifications that your behaviour isn't acceptable.
I told you too, these are CLIPPED OUT OF CONTEXT.

Ye, so? Who gives a shit? 
What they said doesn't mean anything and doesn't justify your Actions.

Btw, last post. I get the shit flying my way. But I express my remorse. And I get zero respect or understanding.. should I not be allowed at least a second chance on parole? Nothin? Nothing at all? Just give me a chance ffs

Nobody here works for riot. We are all players just like you. If you want second chances I suggest you open a ticket and ask nicely. And save the excuses, the backpedaling and the pitty pleas. It won't work there any more than it did here.
Zero support. Nobody believes in second chances... I'm ready to adopt new ideals and rules. Just want people to give me a chance god damnit, is that too much to ask!?

Hey, bud. Hard lesson time. You break the rules, you get punished. That isn't League, that's life.

You're not looking for support, you're looking for validation and for people to tell you it's Not Your Faultâ„¢. Own your shit and maybe you'll get some support. "I fucked up and I know it," goes a long way.

Nobody here is capable of giving you a chance with your account. Nobody here has any power, we're all players like you. Follow the game's rules and try to have fun.

I kind of wanted to say that "I fucked up and I wish I hadn't". I really did fuck up. This post was meant to send the message that I was remorseful and wated another chance to try again. But I've gotten none. I will die here league-wise. After 10 years of playing. Hope you do better, much love frorm Sweden
The guilt trips in all of your replies, holy shit.

> [{quoted}](name=Regn,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=QfNu5gxk,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-22T17:56:39.196+0000)
>
> Zero support. Nobody believes in second chances... I'm ready to adopt new ideals and rules. Just want people to give me a chance god damnit, is that too much to ask!?

You get 3 chances to 1 chance. 3 if it was just normal toxicity, 1 if it was like racist so on so forth. The only time you get insta permabanned is cheating.  So you were given at LEAST 1 chance. You claim it is **IT IS A MATCH WE ARE SUPPOSE TO TAUNT EACH OTHER.(YEAH BUT NOT YOUR OWN TEAM!!! THEY ARE NOT THE ENEMY.**  All you did was tilt them though them replying to you makes them guilty as well since you guys were not operating at your best in a rank match I will assume. So you ruined it for the people that were just trying to win. Weather they suck or not you can say at the endgame lobby. I tell people they need to get better. stop fn feeding. w.e I just dont spend the entire match doing it and i havent been chat banned. (Not to mention over time you lose those strikes and your account can become completely clean of offences again.)

Goodbye, League. I leave with tears in my eyes, and I know my late friend would agree with me when I say that this game is dead as it was founded. It's a new era, and I give the stick over to a new player... good luck. And goodbye again.
I don't think you understand what a "goodbye" message implies...

You keep talking about getting a second chance, when in fact you already did get one: your first punishment would've been a 10-game chat restriction. That was Riot giving you a second chance rather than deleting your account. And then you got another chat restriction. And then you got a 14-day suspension and were told to cut it out or it would become permanent. You chose to keep harassing people rather than be civil, so you got one last punishment, which was permanent due to your punishment history.

So really, you got a second chance, a third chance, and a fourth chance... and you blew them all.

No problem, here you go! Here is what I got banned for

[8:16] [All] Regn (Veigar): eat dirt bitch!
[8:21] [All] Regn (Veigar): yeah
[8:25] [All] Regn (Veigar): Suck on that homeboy!

[21:30] Regn (Veigar): Ah a Frenchman
[21:38] Regn (Veigar): No win for you. 

[9:56] Regn (Vel'Koz): Kayle is bad, dont expect a proper gank when he gets there
[11:37] Regn (Vel'Koz): I wont even comment about this bad jungler

[7:37] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): No offense talon, But you are a r%%%%%

[10:37] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): asswipe

[15:27] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): idc
[15:47] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): First time we killed you, you just stood there
[15:51] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): Like a scarecrow

[21:36] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): rekt dude
[21:49] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): Have you seen talon?
[23:05] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): I mean this champ sucks so hard
[23:27] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): All you do is press a few keys. But I will surpass you, you'll see
[23:36] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): At that stage, you will be -fucked-
[23:52] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): You mistkae me for someone who cares
[25:01] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): Haah I hit home
[25:08] [All] Regn (Twisted Fate): Fiddle got so mad after my lul comment

[30:23] Regn (Twisted Fate): push!
[30:35] Regn (Twisted Fate): Hes garbage
[30:38] Regn (Twisted Fate): dont worry about him

[40:29] Regn (Twisted Fate): Jax is ofc a -10iq player
[40:37] Regn (Twisted Fate): Chasing a blitzcrank over winning the match
[41:13] Regn (Twisted Fate): He is solo player as I said from the start
The *unedited* chat logs...
What do you mean?
These logs aren't the ones we normally see from the reform card when someone logs in on a punished account. It has unusual spacing, time stamps, and mentions [All].
These are most likely from Support, which may explain the wonky spacing, time stamps, and /all.
I expect you mean the %%%%%% but I didn't put them there, it's originally saying "r%%%%%"

Lol oh I see those wonderful greetings you spoke of. Warms my heart.
If anything, you can read this and  remember what not to say in game. No matter your mindset, no matter if they say the same things to you... it's not worth it. I dont want more lives to be ruined.
logs or didn't happen

So it's been a little while now and I've received zero support for my case. I will close this thread with these words: I realize I did wrong, and wish I could take it back, but I can't. And nobody seems to care about second chances, nevertheless, I wish everyone who tuned in here a great weekend, and if this does turn out to be my last touch as a League player, I love you all very much. No game is a game without its community, peace.

At this point, there is no unbanning perm banned players. They started an experiment last year but have been keeping things hush hush. We don't know if it is still going on or not.

Community support won't help if the punishment is valid and you haven't skipped any steps in the punishment system. If this is your first offense and is a perm, that is one thing. However, if you have had chat restrictions, and/or a 14 day ban; then perm is the next step. The final chance to change is after the 14 day ban.
Good luck if you ever choose to come back <3
You don't get permanently banned without warnings so if you did you deserve it.
I'm sorry you think of my banishment like that, but nevertheless, I don't judge you for it. Have a great weekend my fellow summoner
SO whatever I do, I get shut shown.  Thats the essenstial llessojn here.

> [{quoted}](name=Regn,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=QfNu5gxk,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-03-22T19:53:43.379+0000)
>
> SO whatever I do, I get shut shown.  Thats the essenstial llessojn here.

Sorry,you just really rubbed people the wrong way with the way you played the victim and exploited the story of your friend to garner sympathy. It was rather disgusting to read to be honest.

Can you finally move on after **several** 'goodbye messages'? 
We don't care, neither can we help and are glad another toxic person is gone.
